titleStmt.title: An help to prayer: for the catechised youth of the Church of England Very useful for parents and masters to teach their children and servants how to pray. Imprimatur, Martii, 22. 1677/8 Guil. Sill.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M.C. for Henry Brome, at the Gun at the West end of St. Pauls,
